main event: Civilian witnesses observed two bright lights drifting down a mountain in Palmer, Alaska on October 15, 1953.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing two bright lights, estimated to be 4.5-45 miles away,The lights were described as golden in color,The object drifted one mile up the river before rising out of sight,The observation lasted approximately 1.5 minutes,The incident is noted as being of possible significance but insufficient for sound conclusions.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
